name: Magic Touch - Piano Rhythm
description:
Magic Touch Piano Rhythm - it’s the easiest to touch the sound of piano for every moment and everywhere– with a smartphone.
The user can access to the latest hit songs with thousands of piano rhythm , which can be classified as classic, modern, edm, dubstep...
The right music is always at your touch of fingertips and Magic Touch Piano Rhythm brings a high-quality realistic Piano simulation to your iOS devices
• The easiest way to play piano.
• Comes with over 400 songs to enjoy
• Realistic piano sounds
• Beautiful retina graphics
• Fun, relax and free music.
• practice piano and skills solo
Download Magic Touch Piano Rhythm and choose what you want to play and let Magic Touch Piano Rhythm surprise you.
